page.title: 14Health in Woodsetts
page.content: When people in{Woodsetts}are ill they mostly go to{Worksop}surgery. Some go to{Dinnington,Woodsetts, {Langold or Maltby}surgery.When people get very ill they go to hospital in {Worksop.}Not a lot of people have bad teeth in our block because there are a lot of{dentists}in{Dinnington, {Worksop,Handsworth,North Anston, {Maltby,Conisbrough and Carlton.}The most popular is Worksop.There are four people in our class that wear glasses. Most people go to{Dinnington {opticians.}When people die in {Woodsetts}they are buried in{Woodsetts church yard or cremated at{Worksop.
